function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Guidelines for air-conditioning and ventilation systems may not adequately address the transmission mechanism of SARS-CoV-2, leading to ineffective measures.","Impact":"Continued transmission of SARS-CoV-2 within buildings and public spaces, contributing to the spread of COVID-19.","Mitigation":"Ensure that guidelines and recommendations are based on the latest understanding of SARS-CoV-2 transmission and are regularly updated as new information becomes available.","Technologies":"Improved air filtration systems, air purifiers, and ventilation designs that minimize the spread of airborne particles.","People":"Building occupants, visitors, and the general public who are at risk of contracting SARS-CoV-2.","Owner":"Health authorities, building management, HVAC professionals, and policymakers."}]}
